name: Nomophobia (Dustiwi)
description:
The objective of the game is to use your phone to charge the main elevator on the center of the map, watch out for the entities coming after you, watch your battery, as using your phone will drain it, look for battery charges and don't let it reach 0%. Be careful when entering apartments and try not to spend too much time inside them.

We are currently working on more levels and more mechanics to spice things up.
